welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Guacimo, Costa Rica! Known for its charming streets and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore our city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy the beauty of our nature and immerse yourself in our vibrant culture. Bienvenidos!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rio Frio Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rio Frio Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tortuquero Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in some areas.
